posts.post_content: This is designed to kill dredge or loam decks, or any deck that combos quick out of the graveyard. It isn't the greatest outside of those situations, but most sideboard cards are like that. Mulligan until you get it in your opening hand and the game is yours.
posts.html:
This is designed to kill dredge or loam decks, or any deck that combos quick out of the graveyard. It isn't the greatest outside of those situations, but most sideboard cards are like that. Mulligan until you get it in your opening hand and the game is yours.
Report Abuse

posts.post_content: Like what unban shahrazad said, this card can be used IN Dredge decks as well as OPPOSED to them. Otherwise opponents can sack like a Sakura Tribe Elder just to ruin your combo.
